testrunner.executor
Interface StepExecutor

All Known Implementing Classes:
BaseStepExecutor, EnterTextStepExecutor, LinkClickStepExecutor, SelectOptionStepExecutor, SubmitActionStepExecutor, URLStepExecutor
public interface StepExecutor

The StepExecutor Interface defines the single behavior which is executing a passed Step. For more concrete implementations, extending classes should extend BaseStepExecutor

Version:
1.0
Author:
Dasarathy Ponnappan

Method Summary
 void executeStep(Step step, org.openqa.selenium.WebDriver driver, StepResult result)
          This method defines the entry point for any step execution.
 

Method Detail

executeStep

void executeStep(Step step,
                 org.openqa.selenium.WebDriver driver,
                 StepResult result)
This method defines the entry point for any step execution. Implementing classes should ensure that following aspects of steps are taken care
  • The start time of step execution needs to be recorded in StepResult
  • The Step should be validated before being executed
  • If there are any validation errors then the error needs to be recorded in StepResult along with a status of Result.FAILED
  • Irrespective of step execution the end time needs to be recorded.

Parameters:
step - - Step to execute
driver - - Driver to use to execute the step
result - - Result of the step
